about_the_game: This "DLC" is a digital art and lore book for Fables of Talumos. The book is 34 pages in length and provides detailed information on the world of Talumos including its races, gods and history. The book contains rough sketches, pixel art versions, as well as a few concept and finalized illustrations by Dan Beckerton (The Cheesemaster himself) and the very talented Kim Junghee (@jungheekimart).
detailed_description: This "DLC" is a digital art and lore book for Fables of Talumos. The book is 34 pages in length and provides detailed information on the world of Talumos including its races, gods and history. The book contains rough sketches, pixel art versions, as well as a few concept and finalized illustrations by Dan Beckerton (The Cheesemaster himself) and the very talented Kim Junghee (@jungheekimart).

short_description: This "DLC" is an art and lore book for the game Fables of Talumos. The book contains loads of background information about the game as well as rough sketches, pixel art, and beautiful watercolour paintings.
